channel.title: Victor Alpha on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Victor Alpha on My New Hugo Site

item.description:
Play: Apple - setup#

  • hosts: loadbalancers become: true vars: app_name: “apple_app” retry_count: 5

    tasks:

    • name: Ensure foxtrot-task-1 is present ansible.builtin.file: path: /opt/apple/foxtrot-task-1 state: directory

    • name: Template foxtrot-task-1 config ansible.builtin.template: src: templates/foxtrot-task-1.j2 dest: /etc/apple/foxtrot-task-1.conf mode: ‘0644’

    Description:#

    Sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Integer nec odio. Praesent libero. Sed cursus ante dapibus diam.#

    • name: Ensure kilo-task-2 is present ansible.builtin.file: path: /opt/apple/kilo-task-2 state: directory

    • name: Template kilo-task-2 config ansible.builtin.template: src: templates/kilo-task-2.j2 dest: /etc/apple/kilo-task-2.conf mode: ‘0644’
